text: His Sudden Recovery is a 1914 American silent comedy film featuring Oliver Hardy. ==Cast== * Oliver Hardy - Mr. Jones (as Babe Hardy) * Eloise Willard - Mrs. Jones * Frances Ne Moyer - Their daughter * Marguerite Ne Moyer - The Maid * Julia Calhoun - The Trained Nurse ==See also== * List of American films of 1914 * Oliver Hardy filmography ==External links== * Category:1914 films Category:1914 short films Category:American silent short films Category:American films Category:American black-and-white films Category:1914 comedy films Category:Films directed by Arthur Hotaling Category:American comedy films Category:Comedy short films
title: His Sudden Recovery
